casts.title: ShopTalk
casts.description: After getting hooked into podcasts by Serial I had a look around to see if any front end developer podcasts existed. I didn't expect to find much, so when ShopTalk showed up it was the only dev podcast I listened to for quite a while! Until they started mentioning other dev podcasts...

casts.title: Codepen Radio
casts.description: The story and tech behind Codepen, a lot of the subjects they cover here have helped point my thinking for the WL project.

casts.title: This Developers Life
casts.description: A short series of podcasts about life as a developer. I think this may have been my third development podcast, after this it gets a bit hazy - too many to remember!

casts.title: Javascript Jabber
casts.description: Weekly chats and interviews about javascript, it's pretty wide ranging between soft and hard skills too.

casts.title: Does Not Compute
casts.description: A couple of developers chatting about development, they lean more towards the back end but client side code does make appearances!

casts.title: JS Party
casts.description: Informal chats and interviews about a range of topics in JavaScript, frequently regarding Node.

casts.title: Full Stack Radio
casts.description: Interviews with developers, so far this one has the widest range of technologies of the podcasts I listen to.

casts.title: Request for Commits
casts.description: Interviews with people running open source communities and what it takes to keep those communities healthy.

casts.title: Scale Your Code
casts.description: A series of interviews with developers / tech directors / very impressive people from big companies about the challenges of developing at huge scales.

casts.title: Soft Skills Engineering
casts.description: Listeners submit questions, these two answer with examples from their own experience. Purely about the non technical stuff surrounding development careers.

casts.title: Style Guide Podcast
casts.description: From styleguides.io, this is a series of interviews with developers who have created styleguides.

casts.title: Syntax
casts.description: 2 developers chatting about development! These two run their own tutorial businesses & do contracting, so it's an interesting view into that world as well.

casts.title: The Changelog
casts.description: Interviews with open source developers, from dev ops to feds.

casts.title: Toolsday
casts.description: Themed chats about development tools by 2 front end devs at IBM. ~20mins and pretty informal with the occasional guest appearance.

casts.title: Machine Learning Guide
casts.description: A series that gives a high level overview of machine learning. A kick off point for getting into the area.
